languages.text: {n}Владайм раздраженно кривится.{/n} "Судя по моему опыту, такие как она исправляются не раньше, чем за их спиной закроется створ компрессионного шлюза".

traits.locale_text: {n}Владайм раздраженно кривится.{/n} "Таких, как она, исправят лишь объятия пустоты по другую сторону шлюза".

languages.text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм раздраженно кривится.{/n} "Судя по моему опыту, такие как она исправляются не раньше, чем за их спиной закроется створ компрессионного шлюза".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf no sooner than the door of the compression airlock closes behind them."
{n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf no sooner than the door of the compression airlock closes behind them."
{n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."
{n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."
{n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは悔し気に顔をしかめる。{/n}「私の経験上、彼女のような人間は、エアロックのドアが閉まった途端に別人になる。それより早く心を入れ替えることはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは悔し気に顔をしかめる。{/n}「私の経験上、彼女のような人間は、エアロックのドアが閉まった途端に別人になる。それより早く心を入れ替えることはない」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆露出了恼怒的神情。{/n}“根据我的经验，像她这样的人，往往只有气闸的门在他们身后关上时，他们才会洗心革面。在此之前，他们绝对不会痛改前非。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆露出了恼怒的神情。{/n}“根据我的经验，像她这样的人，往往只有气闸的门在他们身后关上时，他们才会洗心革面。在此之前，他们绝对不会痛改前非。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym hace una mueca de repulsión.{/n} «Desde la experiencia le digo que la gente como ella aprende únicamente cuando le cierran la esclusa que tienen detrás; no en otro momento».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym hace una mueca de repulsión.{/n} «Desde la experiencia le digo que la gente como ella aprende únicamente cuando le cierran la esclusa que tienen detrás; no en otro momento».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym grimace d'irritation.{/n} « D'après mon expérience, les gens comme elle ne s'achètent une conduite qu'en entendant la fermeture du sas dernière eux, et jamais une seconde plus tôt. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym grimace d'irritation.{/n} « D'après mon expérience, les gens comme elle ne s'achètent une conduite qu'en entendant la fermeture du sas dernière eux, et jamais une seconde plus tôt. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym verzieht verwirrt das Gesicht.{/n} "Meiner Erfahrung nach verändern sich Menschen wie sie erst, wenn sich die Tür der Luftschleuse hinter ihnen schließt, keine Sekunde früher."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym verzieht verwirrt das Gesicht.{/n} "Meiner Erfahrung nach verändern sich Menschen wie sie erst, wenn sich die Tür der Luftschleuse hinter ihnen schließt, keine Sekunde früher."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, yüzünü sıkıntıyla buruşturuyor.{/n} "Tecrübelerime dayanarak söyleyebilirim ki onun gibiler, yeni bir sayfa açmaya yalnızca hava kilidinin kapısı arkalarından kapandığında sıcak bakar. Aksi mümkün değildir."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym grimaces in vexation.{/n} "In my experience, people like her tend to turn a new leaf only when the door of the airlock shuts behind them, and not a moment sooner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, yüzünü sıkıntıyla buruşturuyor.{/n} "Tecrübelerime dayanarak söyleyebilirim ki onun gibiler yeni bir sayfa açmaya yalnızca hava kilidinin kapısı arkalarından kapandığında sıcak bakar, aksi mümkün değil."
